name: Crypto Range-Compression Breakout
description: Trend-following breakout strategy for daily BTC & ETH using Range Compression with Volume Thrust. Enters on a breakout from a 10-day compression box accompanied by ≥30 % volume thrust; exits via 6 % initial stop, 12 % profit target, trailing logic embedded inside signal, and EMA-based trend filter. Position size risks 3 % of equity based on initial stop.
